allow:
Bash(node -e "const p=require\('path'\),f=require\('fs'\),h=require\('os'\).homedir\(\),d=process.env.CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR||p.join\(h,'.claude'\),b=p.join\(d,'plugins','cache','omc','oh-my-claudecode'\);try{const v=f.readdirSync\(b\).filter\(x=>/^\\d/.test\(x\)\).sort\(\(a,c\)=>a.localeCompare\(c,void 0,{numeric:true}\)\);console.log\('Installed:',v.length?v[v.length-1]:'\(none\)'\)}catch{console.log\('Installed: \(none\)'\)}"
npm view oh-my-claude-sisyphus version 2>/dev/null || echo "Latest: \(unavailable\)")
